titleStmt.title: A view of the people of the vvhole vvorld, or, A short survey of their policies, dispositions, naturall deportments, complexions, ancient and moderne customes, manners, habits & fashions a worke every where adorned with philosophicall, morall, and historicall observations on the occasions of their mutations & changes throughout all ages : for the readers greater delight figures are annexed to most of the relations / scripsit J.B. ...
Anthropometamorphosis
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Bulwer), fl. 1648-1654.

notesStmt.note: First published in 1650 with title: Anthropometamorphosis.
